scripts.build: next build && cp -r public .next/standalone/public && cp -r .next/static .next/standalone/.next/static && node monkey-patch.js && rm -rf .next/standalone/node_modules && rm -rf .freestylebuild && mkdir .freestylebuild && cp -r .next/standalone/* .freestylebuild && cp -r .next/standalone/.next .freestylebuild/
